concept.title: (x,y) Co-ordinate System
concept.shortdesc: The co-ordinate origin of a window is its top left corner. Positive co-ordinate values indicate positions to the right and down from the origin. Negative values are also valid, and indicate co-ordinates outside the window's extent.

conbody.p: Variant: Both (ScreenPlay and non-ScreenPlay). Target audience: Application developers.

Each window has a position, which is the position of its origin relative to its parentâ€™s origin. If its parent is a window group, then its position is effectively relative to the top left corner of the screen or display device, because window groups do not have a size.
